ftb.iteminfo.sky_dust: Sky Dust can be generated by pointing an Annihilation Plane at the sky at build limit (§2Y=319§r).
ftb.iteminfo.nether_star: Nether Stars are dropped by the Wither boss.
ftb.iteminfo.grains_of_infinity: Grains of Infinity can also be obtained by traveling below -32. They will generate passively here over time. Falling into the void also works!
ftb.iteminfo.supplementaries.ash: Ash can be obtained by burning logs or enemies with fire.
